value.text: Earth Kingdom; specifically prairies near Si Wong Desert
value.value_text: Earth Kingdom; specifically prairies near Si Wong Desert

paragraphs.body: The singing groundhog is an ${link_0} that resides on the prairies near the ${link_1}. It is able to mimic any note with near perfection.
paragraphs.text: The singing groundhog is an animal that resides on the prairies near the Si Wong Desert. It is able to mimic any note with near perfection.

paragraphs.body: As part of ${link_0}'s mini-vacations, ${link_1} chose to visit the territory of the singing groundhogs in order to play around with the ${link_2} abilities of these little creatures. Aang demonstrated, by playing the flute, that they had an innate musical ability, and would respond to any musical note by singing a usually pitch-perfect response, even responding to ${link_3}'s sarcastic "la dee da". As Aang kept playing, ${link_4} attempted to capture one of these animals by running after them every time they popped out of their holes to respond to Aang's notes. Momo even hopped into the holes of the small creatures in his pursuit.
paragraphs.text: As part of Team Avatar's mini-vacations, Aang chose to visit the territory of the singing groundhogs in order to play around with the musical abilities of these little creatures. Aang demonstrated, by playing the flute, that they had an innate musical ability, and would respond to any musical note by singing a usually pitch-perfect response, even responding to Sokka's sarcastic "la dee da". As Aang kept playing, Momo attempted to capture one of these animals by running after them every time they popped out of their holes to respond to Aang's notes. Momo even hopped into the holes of the small creatures in his pursuit.

paragraphs.body: These creatures live in colonies on wide open prairies near the Si Wong Desert, and like ordinary groundhogs, they feed off insects and roots. With an ear for music, they will respond to single tones from a flute or other instrument by repeating that tone back to the player. The musical abilities of these little critters attract tourists from all over the ${link_0}. Singing groundhogs are hibernating creatures, and cannot be found during the winter.
paragraphs.text: These creatures live in colonies on wide open prairies near the Si Wong Desert, and like ordinary groundhogs, they feed off insects and roots. With an ear for music, they will respond to single tones from a flute or other instrument by repeating that tone back to the player. The musical abilities of these little critters attract tourists from all over the world. Singing groundhogs are hibernating creatures, and cannot be found during the winter.

paragraphs.body: The singing groundhog seems closely related to the real life prairie dog, which, unlike the real life groundhog, often pops out of small holes in the ground.
paragraphs.text: The singing groundhog seems closely related to the real life prairie dog, which, unlike the real life groundhog, often pops out of small holes in the ground.
